Adventure Guide: The protection blessing is a special protection given to *characters under level 39 who have not made* the second transfer. While a character has this blessing, *he or she cannot either inflict or receive damage when* in combat with a chaotic character 10 or more levels higher than they are. The protection does not apply to the battle field, however. Would you like to receive the protection? [npc_%objectId%_ProtectionBlessing|Receive the Blessing of Protection.]
